mapper.select: select * from goot6.Boards where board_category = 'camping' order by board_no desc
mapper.insert: insert into Boards(member_id, board_title, board_category, board_content) values(#{member_id}, #{board_title}, 'humor', #{board_content})
mapper.update: update Boards set board_title = #{board_title}, board_content = #{board_content} where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.delete: update Boards set board_isDelete = 'Y' where board_no = #{board_no}
mapper.select: select * from Boards where board_category = 'humor' order by board_no desc limit #{pageStart}, #{perPageNum}
mapper.update: update Boards set board_viewCnt = board_viewCnt + 1 where board_no = #{board_no}
